title: Chloe Grace Moretz joins Alicia Vikander for Louis Vuitton opening in Seoul
text:
She's known for her quirky sense of style in a slew of colourful looks.

And Chloe Grace Moretz was proudly displaying her slender pins in a kooky printed mini dress on Wednesday, as she attended the grand opening of the Louis Vuitton Maison Seoul in the South Korean city.

The actress, 22, looked sensational as she joined Alicia Vikander, 31, who opted for a similarly quirky collared dress in an array of different prints.

Chic: Chloe Grace Moretz, 22, cut a stylish figure in a kooky printed mini dress on Wednesday as she attended the grand opening of the Louis Vuitton Maison Seoul in the South Korean city

Chloe displayed her fun and playful fashion sense in her orange and purple satin dress which boasted an oriental inspired print of beautiful flowers.

The Carrie star's dress boasted a contrasting black collar and puffed white sleeves and flashed a hint of flesh through a black tied neckline.

Chloe completed her styles look with chunky heeled loafers as she celebrated the opening to the designer's lavish new store in Seoul.

Quirky: Oscar winner Alicia Vikander, 31, was also in attendance for the launch and arrived in a thigh-skimming mini dress boasting an array of different prints

Alicia was also oozing rustic chic as she highlighted her jaw-dropping pins at the lavish store opening.

The Oscar winner's amazing dress boasted a red and black sequinned bodice with a 60s-style collar and contrasting striped sleeves.

The fun ra-ra skirt of the dress accentuated Alicia's endless pins and she completed her look with black thin-strapped heels.

Suave: DJ Mark Ronson cut a dapper figure in all-black as he arrived for the lavish launch in Seoul

Allowing her glamorous look to be the centre of attention Alicia pulled her beautiful caramel tresses into a sleek half-up half-down style.

The launch Louis Vuitton Maison Seoul marked a brand new collaboration with architects Frank Gehry and Peter Marino.

It is set to hold an exhibition space on the upper floor, which hosts a show of eight sculptures by Alberto Giacometti in celebration of the grand opening.

Louis Vuitton is also set to stage a spin-off cruise 2020 fashion show tomorrow on Thursday in a setting which will be inspired by Gehry‘s jaw-dropping architectural designs.
description: The actress, 22, looked sensational as she joined Alicia Vikander, 31, for the grand opening of the Louis Vuitton Maison Seoul in the South Korean city on Tuesday.
